entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
